parameters.name: Flags
parameters.description: Mouse-event flags as defined by the operating system. They can be combined to indicate the selection state. For example: Left-mouse button is pressed: 0x0001 Right-mouse button is pressed: 0x0002 Shift key is pressed: 0x0004 Ctrl key is pressed: 0x0008 Middle-mouse button is pressed: 0x0010

title: IModelDoc2.DragTo
signature:
void DragTo( 
   System.Int32
Flags
,
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Double
Z
)

parameters.name: Flags
parameters.description: Mouse-event flags as defined by the operating system. They can be combined to indicate the selection state. For example: Left-mouse button is pressed: 0x0001 Right-mouse button is pressed: 0x0002 Shift key is pressed: 0x0004 Ctrl key is pressed: 0x0008 Middle-mouse button is pressed: 0x0010

remarks: This method is only valid for assemblies.
